Subject: Chalhoub University Learning Directory, P&C Townhall, Welcoming Our NewGen Cohort 2, Chalhoub 30x30 Challenge Completed, Cafe L'Occitane Winter Menu, Jimmy Choo X HIAHUB, Swarovski X Wicked Premiere & Samsung Black Friday Sale

The Chalhoub University Learning Directory is now live!


This comprehensive resource is designed to help you navigate the diverse range of learning and development programmes. From advancing leadership skills and mastering retail expertise to embracing digital transformation and enhancing wellbeing, Chalhoub University provides a diverse range of programmes and solutions to support you at every stage of your learning journey.

Take the next step in your development today - Explore now! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fcourse%252fview.php%253fid%253d3368%2526ct%253dt(EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_3_22_2023_11_39_COPY_01)%2526mc_cid%253d383e19bdc7%2526mc_eid%253d9c8c5c32c6%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWc4%252bU8FIIVSSGhpius%252fiVa8RV74C0famu%252bEG6fniUsOkyX2HwyLtS%252fq%252fvmCbJK60x4li98KvwOriuLrVcyHKV24o9dWqUWJCsXeNH9C4hep6GcmvRYb%252bhsrREXqF3aIB3ss92tbK5MndF8zLL%252f7f1atVbTkRxmlNt9sHHgduPsOnHQHaIYutDqpWqYUm%252fk8vk%252b%252bMaLhPBSezwYKpybHcs6f48i4dpqu9wDzcjUpR9ILQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca7a3f4c12368475dfe7108dd0e10e114%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638682187864797407%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GCowrmlbQMKZl1VoEZg%2FVaOPynocPg2J9SgZdM1tzIE%3D&reserved=0>

THE LAST P&C TOWNHALL OF THE YEAR

Last week’s People & Culture Townhall, brought team members together virtually for a session where they shared updates, inspiring initiatives, and impactful projects.The session included end-of-year messages and wishes from our P&C leaders and concluded with the announcement of the SHINE Awards winners. See more! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fthe-last-p-c-town-hall-of-the-year%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWc4%252bU8FIIVSSGhpius%252fiVa8RV74C0famu%252bEG6fniUsOkyX2HwyLtS%252fq%252fvmCbJK60x4li98KvwOriuLrVcyHKV24o9dWqUWJCsXeNH9C4hep6GcmvRYb%252bhsrREXqF3aIB3ss92tbK5MndF8zLL%252f7f1atVbTkRxmlNt9sHHgduPsOnHQHaIYutDqpWqYUm%252fk8vk%252b%252bMaLhPBSezwYKpybHcs6f48i4dpqu9wDzcjUpR9ILQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca7a3f4c12368475dfe7108dd0e10e114%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638682187864818568%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=RvjRqUl76NPILMceKxT12na7j2P0ykI7shf%2BnU2Tg9k%3D&reserved=0>

WELCOMING OUR NEWGEN COHORT 2 NEW JOINERS 

Please join us in welcoming to Anastasia Belova - Fashion Innovation NewGen Trainee, Alya Nasser - NewGen - Marketing Trainee with OTB, Noura Layssar - NewGen Trainee - Shopper Coordinator at Threads Styling and Mouna Al Sabbagh - NewGen - Marketing Trainee at Level Shoes.

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fuser-profile%252fMTQ4MTA%25253D%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWc4%252bU8FIIVSSGhpius%252fiVa8RV74C0famu%252bEG6fniUsOkyX2HwyLtS%252fq%252fvmCbJK60x4li98KvwOriuLrVcyHKV24o9dWqUWJCsXeNH9C4hep6GcmvRYb%252bhsrREXqF3aIB3ss92tbK5MndF8zLL%252f7f1atVbTkRxmlNt9sHHgduPsOnHQHaIYutDqpWqYUm%252fk8vk%252b%252bMaLhPBSezwYKpybHcs6f48i4dpqu9wDzcjUpR9ILQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca7a3f4c12368475dfe7108dd0e10e114%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638682187864832375%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Y11m44XIs%2FWl3KXqPStK0z4Ps3PIk8OPPniZRjswsFE%3D&reserved=0>

CHALHOUB 30X30 CHALLENGE COMPLETED

Together, we completed 57,000,000 steps! Whether you walked, ran, worked out, or simply stayed active, YOU made it happen. A huge thank you for bringing your energy and enthusiasm to this initiative. 

By prioritising our well-being, we’ve taken a meaningful step toward building a stronger and healthier community.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/GdDsj274wEeHRutP-f7GlA/550677/6C95B6B57B82B4639315C79C50305824/image-27.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/GdDsj274wEeHRutP-f7GlA/544550/E671B88D36A23B80674753AA2253E43A/nuggets-20.png> 	

CAFÉ L’OCCITANE WINTER MENU

From Provence to you 

This Festive season, delight your guests with unique recipes inspired by the beauty of Provence with an exclusive 25% off!

Place your order via email <mailto:Khaled.Dakdouk@chalhoub.com> or by calling:  056 550 6811 - 055 345 2186

See full menu here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonline.flippingbook.com%252fview%252f909532065%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWc4%252bU8FIIVSSGhpius%252fiVa8RV74C0famu%252bEG6fniUsOkyX2HwyLtS%252fq%252fvmCbJK60x4li98KvwOriuLrVcyHKV24o9dWqUWJCsXeNH9C4hep6GcmvRYb%252bhsrREXqF3aIB3ss92tbK5MndF8zLL%252f7f1atVbTkRxmlNt9sHHgduPsOnHQHaIYutDqpWqYUm%252fk8vk%252b%252bMaLhPBSezwYKpybHcs6f48i4dpqu9wDzcjUpR9ILQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca7a3f4c12368475dfe7108dd0e10e114%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638682187864845827%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=oT0WtJc2yAtk9cNEaEfzcXauM1%2BMz3Hg3IZOei5xM4s%3D&reserved=0>

JIMMY CHOO X HIA HUB

Jimmy Choo debuted its first regional art partnership by sponsoring the work of Saudi artist Zahrah AlGhamdi, with the goal of supporting local talent and empowering female creatives.

The installation was presented at the HIA HUB in Riyadh last month.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/GdDsj274wEeHRutP-f7GlA/550680/E320150F8D7428EC40A1A3C992892585/jimmy-choo-x-hib-hub.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/GdDsj274wEeHRutP-f7GlA/545152/BC30777DF466A0D9994A699CC052F75D/nuggets-48.png> 	

SWAROVSKI X WICKED PREMIERE AT VOX CINEMAS

During the premiere of Ariana Grande's WICKED movie at Mall of the Emirates, Swarovski showcased Ariana Grande's campaign in the presence of influencers and media. The movie features a collection of Swarovski styles, and you can now shop the looks from her Holiday Campaign, available in stores and online. <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.swarovski.ae%252fthe-holiday-collection.html%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWc4%252bU8FIIVSSGhpius%252fiVa8RV74C0famu%252bEG6fniUsOkyX2HwyLtS%252fq%252fvmCbJK60x4li98KvwOriuLrVcyHKV24o9dWqUWJCsXeNH9C4hep6GcmvRYb%252bhsrREXqF3aIB3ss92tbK5MndF8zLL%252f7f1atVbTkRxmlNt9sHHgduPsOnHQHaIYutDqpWqYUm%252fk8vk%252b%252bMaLhPBSezwYKpybHcs6f48i4dpqu9wDzcjUpR9ILQ&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ca7a3f4c12368475dfe7108dd0e10e114%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638682187864858967%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=lWbfSJ5Xcdmi8wjIMLmVHroakqIQZFvMfVQdh6jE%2B6E%3D&reserved=0>
